betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Sanity Checker roughly displays the amount of distortion (Warp) you currently possess. The colors indicate different levels of Warp:

Light Pink: Represents temporary distortions.
Light Purple: Indicates impending normal or sticky distortions.
Dark Purple: Denotes permanent distortions.
This tool helps track and manage Warp, allowing players to better understand and control the consequences of their magical practices.
